name: Greed (itch) (OneThreeZeroFour)
description:
Players take turns drawing cards from the deck until they choose to end their turn, or are forced to do so. The goal is to achieve the highest score, which is increased by drawing numbered cards.

Players must voluntarily pass their turn in order to save the accumulated score, lest they draw the wrong card and lose all their progress!

But... what about just one more card...? What could go wrong?

CREDITS

  • Cute Cards Deck by DANI MACCARI
  • Humble Fonts by somepx
